turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I I want to make a order for a Starbuck espresso beverages.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that just a regular coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, let me get a regular coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And make it the large size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i'm sorry, you'll need to specify a flavor.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What kind of flavors do they have?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Vanilla, Sugar-free vanilla, Maple, Hazelnut, Sugar-free chocolate sauce, Cinnabon Bun.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get the the third one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you want maple, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and do you want this iced or hot?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let me get Let me have just a little bit of ice.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so, you want a venti coffee with a little ice with whole milk and maple starbucks on california street.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message. Enjoy your drink!
